Unfortunately this is the same useless activator that was uploaded by android.androyd on Sept. 2. It does not activate windows 8. Evidenced by personalization still being locked. All it does is generate windows script dialogue boxes that say it is activated permanently. If it was genuinely activated personalization would be unlocked. It does say activated in the computer properties, but you will notice that it does not display the "Genuine Windows" icon on the right side of window next to activation message. To the leecher that says it will lock you out. That is absurd, it does not "lock" anyone out, neither does it really activate. Wait until KMS servers are up, hopefully later this month.
